alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 10:02PM CDT until April 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1002 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crumrod, or 9 miles southeast of White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Bolivar County, including the following locations... Alligator. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
